# UI Value
<!--
@name: UI Value
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Updates ths value of a UI Component.
## Parameters

- **id&dollar;**: The unique identifier for the component you want to set its value.
- **value&dollar;**: The value used to update the component.
---
